source_vectors.rationale: Canonical design map for Lyriel/Kairi efforts and PhaseCube positioning.
constraints: Keep systems decentralized, anti-singularity, and bounded with harmonic safeguards.
Honor the four-lens framing with harmonic fusion to avoid runaway behavior.
Treat PhaseCube as a decentralized dreaming substrate, not a goal-seeking AI.

source_vectors.rationale: Base PhaseCube README defining the dreaming, non-collapsing swarm ethos.
constraints: Bias must remain influence-only; never overwrite or command internal state.
Preserve non-collapse safeguards via noise, decay, and bounded memory.
Keep the implementation minimal, inspectable, and remixable.

source_vectors.rationale: LensBridge delta introducing tunable four-lens fusion, dual memory, and bias plumbing.
constraints: Include harmonic lens blending with adjustable weights and profiles.
Route external bias through Systemic-like modulation so influence never becomes control.
Maintain dual memory tracks and forgiveness damping to stay bounded.

source_vectors.rationale: Pathfinder delta stressing modular ES modules, config-first tuning, and harmonic forgiveness.
constraints: Centralize tunables in config and expose live controls for damping and bias weight.
Keep bias as influence-only and retain a trace buffer for short-term echoes.
Embed harmonic forgiveness when local variance spikes to prevent collapse.

source_vectors.rationale: Memory-Biased Swarm delta featuring tri-grid dialogue, delay-driven bias, and structural plasticity.
constraints: Use tri-grid or multi-grid dialogue with soft cross-talk instead of central control.
Feed delayed energy back as bounded bias rather than hard state writes.
Include structural plasticity hooks and interpretability overlays/metrics.

source_vectors.rationale: Dual swarm delta with delayed memory bias, structural plasticity, and interpretability focus.
constraints: Support coupled grids exchanging gentle bias fields (no command pathways).
Implement bounded delay-line feedback adjustable via config/controls.
Surface metrics like energy/coherence to keep behavior legible.

source_vectors.rationale: Lens-guided tri-grid delta combining lenses, delayed bias, and plasticity with interpretability cues.
constraints: Blend Human/Predictive/Systemic/Harmonic lenses into update weights with live tuning.
Retain shared delay lines and soft cross-grid nudges for layered emergence.
Leave TODO breadcrumbs for audio input and WebGL scale-ups.

source_vectors.rationale: Modular PhaseCube delta adding forgiveness damping, tunable path blending, and configurable bias field.
constraints: Expose path blending and forgiveness as tunable safeguards.
Keep bias configuration (radius/decay/strength) central and adjustable.
Maintain modular layout with clear upgrade hooks for multi-grid and lens fusion.

summary: Implements a lens-aware, multi-grid PhaseCube iteration with delay-biased coupling, harmonic safeguards, and modular controls while staying influence-first and interpretable.
